name: Constantin Brâncuși
description: Romanian sculptor who pioneered modernist sculpture with his abstract, simplified forms. Known for works like 'Bird in Space' and 'The Kiss,' he sought to capture the essence rather than appearance of subjects.
philosophy: Simplicity is complexity resolved. What is real is not the external form, but the essence of things. Starting from this truth it is impossible for anyone to express anything essentially real by imitating its exterior surface.
